name: Crazy Warriors Forward Dash
description:
The game is amazing,How high can you dash?
Dash the hero as high as you can to beat your friends score! Be careful of those blocks and don't let it close on you. They are Dangerous!

How To Play
>tap on the screen to dash
> keep playing and getting better
> this game is not easy but crazy fun

Game Features
>Crazy addicting game play
>Awesome cool to the bone interface and backgrounds
>Sleek fresh images and action
>Adrenalin rush is guaranteed
